Html:
I am getting this exception when trying to generate a PDF file using FO.NET:
System.Exception: Unable to retrieve unicode ranges.
    at Fonet.Pdf.Gdi.GdiUnicodeRanges.LoadRanges(GdiDeviceContent dc)
The interesting thing is that it only happens on Windows Azure with an update called Windows Server RemoteFX VM Components.

Has anyone seen this and knows a fix or a workaround other than manually uninstalling this update all the time?
